markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 57 1.1 **Price** 600 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** L **Activate**Interact --- Opening this vial unleashes its destructive contents: a reconstituted Gargantuan [purple worm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=73). The worm has two functions; choose which one to use when you Activate the item.
  • **Burrow** The worm [Burrows](/Actions.aspx?ID=93) up to 80 feet, leaving a tunnel behind it. It can burrow through solid stone, but if it does so it burrows 40 feet instead of 80 feet.
  • **Eat** The worm attempts to swallow a creature, crush it in its insides, then spit the creature out. The target must be within 15 feet, and it attempts a DC 30 Reflex save. If it fails, it takes 3d6+9 bludgeoning damage (doubled on a critical failure). The worm then spits the creature out to any empty space on the ground within 30 feet, causing the creature to take damage from a 20-foot [fall](/Rules.aspx?ID=402).
**Craft Requirements** Supply the corpse of a purple worm.
name: Worm Vial
